subject: Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Analysts speculate that a track in Hot Springs, Ark., is bringing the unbeaten female horses Rachel Alexandra and Zenyatta together for the Apple Blossom Handicap on April 3.
snippet: Analysts speculate that a track in Hot Springs, Ark., is bringing the unbeaten female horses Rachel Alexandra and Zenyatta together for the Apple Blossom Handicap on April 3.
